example.eg: As the car went into the tunnel the radio signal faded out.
example.egtrans: 汽车驶进隧道，收音机讯号渐弱了。

example.eg: As he listened to the boring speech again he began to fade out, then finally fell asleep.
example.egtrans: 当再一次听到耳畔枯燥无趣的演讲时，他渐渐失去意识，彻底睡着了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 睡去, 渐渐失去意识

example.eg: The scene ended in a shot of birds flying over the ocean, then a fade-out.
example.egtrans: 这一幕以鸟儿飞过大海的镜头来结尾，之后慢慢淡出。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 渐隐, 淡出, 渐消
